** Map by HappyHobo **

Please give constructive critsim and what is bugged with the map/needs improvements. I appreciate it :)

INSTALL NOTES
In order to find this map in your maplist ingame, you'll need to add the ze_infectedcity.bsp file to :

C:\Program files\Steam\steamapps\YourUsernameHere\counter-strike source\cstrike\maps

Also, I've given credits to those who have helped me with resources and tutorials, it's listed in the map itself. If I have forgotten someone, please comment and I'll add it here.

ZE_INDUSTRIAL_DEJAVU
==================

I started the map as a finish-in-one-day map. I managed to get v1 done in one day -and my map file corrupted three disgraceful times on which I had to copypaste the prop statics from the .vmf as raw text- but I felt the map could be extended a bit more, and I took another day to make it more interesting.

The map is not a jewel, but I believe it looks relatively good, has a different gameplay and can be enjoyed for some time. It features:

- 64 spawns
- HDR Lighting
- Random cyclic gameplay (First time ever on a ZE map, I believe!)
- Billions of random gameplay possibilities each round
- 16 different songs
- Simple, teamplay based boss
- 108 random boss setups
- Healthbar during the bossfight
- 3 color corrections
- Graphical improvements
- Admin room
- Three different random endings
- Three zombie weapons
- Five human weapons
- 8 random 'Hallway' (path before the proper first hold) 
- 10 random different 'Hallway holds' (first hold of each cycle)
- 32 random different 'Hall holds' (second, long hold of each cycle)

- 4 different levels
1. Easy: No weapons for the zombies, 4 cycles, small-normal spawn, 0 boss chance, 20k HP (ZM)
2. Normal: One weapon for the zombies, 5 cycles, normal spawn, 1/24 boss chance, 30k HP (ZM)
3. Hard: One weapon for the zombies, 6 cycles, big spawn, 1/12 boss chance, 40k HP (ZM)
4. Extreme: Two weapons for the zombies, only one for the humans, 6 cycles, massive spawn, 1/6 boss chance, 50k HP (ZM)

Gameplay
------------------

The map basically consists on a 'circle' run for a determinate number of cycles. After some cycles, humans will get weapons, zombies will get weapons or the final escape door will open. The paths themselves are simple enough not to get lost by any mean, and the hold spots range from really easy to really hard, being the map based completely on holding.

Rounds get 9 minutes of length, being this forced by the server, and are meant to consist on fast and tight holds that progress towards the three random endings: Boat, Bunker and Helicopter. When won, the level will change, changing with it the level's spawn settings, amount of weapons to spawn, etc. 

Time spent
------------------

I finished this final version of the map in roughly 40 hours, maybe 45. It took two and a half days, and I could say I'm pleased with the overall looks and gameplay. Because of the fast mapping work, I suspect many bugs might be laying inside, awaiting for you to discover them. I'd really love if you helped me out on finding those little bastards.

_sText:
Welcome to Illya!

Illya is a beautiful city built by the Illya Mining Corporation in the year 2080. Illya is built over a rich vein of natural resources running deep into the earth. The city itself is privately run by the corporation, with profits obtained from its mining operation.

Unfortunately, corporate greed may have gone too far. There may be more than anticipated lurking beneath the city.

Features

  • 5 unique stages
  • Varied gameplay, covering ze with zm segments
  • Various custom materials, models, particles
  • Several interactive cinematics

About this project

This map was originally based on an photo found on https://reddit.com/r/evilbuildings in early 2017. It changed a lot as I heard more about Cyberpunk 2077. The design of the city section was based very vaguly on what I felt that game could look like, before screenshots were available. Although, due to engine limitations, it lacks a lot of detail. Hopefully over time this can be optimised and visually improved.

Notes

  • This map will be ported to CS:GO. Please give it some time.
  • This is a beta release. Expect some bugs. Expect some balancing issues.
  • As much as I loved Fate/Kaleid, this map has nothing to do with it. The name is pure coincidence.

***Objective***
The humas have to find and escape from the temple of doom. The map is bassed on the second film of Indiana Jones. So if you watch the film it will be easy for you to know the right path. 
***Notes***
This is a Beta version, I couldn´t test it with people, only alone, so if you try it, please tell me all the things you would improve or change.
***Requeriments***
They aren´t obligatory, but if you have a server with that requeriments the map will be funnier:
Noblock
First Zombie Spawn between 0 and 15 seconds


This is all, if you found any problem with the map, please tell me.

Supreme Elite Community (testing the beta)

To install the map only place the .bsp file inside the maps folder.

RAR file will no longer haver the bz2 for fastdownload, due to long upload and download times, create your own.
-----------------------------------------------------------

The objective of the map is to enter in the scape pods before the giant star destroys the whole station.
There are two escape pods, if both pods are occupied by the same team, this team will win.
If humans and zombies are in different pods after the hypernova they will fight inside the pods.
Humans will be forced to push zombies to the rear sections of the pod, and this section will separate from the structure, killing all players inside.

The map is made for 64 players, is required a zombiemod and noblock to play it. Also works with zombie respawn. Recomended WITHOUT unlimited ammo.
Rear rooms and corridors are closed and teleports enabled to prevent camping and allowing servers with zspawn to keep playing teleporting
respawned people near to the action.

Map include custom particle effects, HDR lighting, color correctionand custom models.
Music comes from the RST game Starcraft.
-----------------------------------------------------------
Changelog

--V1--

First release

--v1b--

-Fixed some crates in that players can get stucked.
-Modifyed the time of the map events to accelerate gameplay, now the game ends in less than 9 minutes instead of running out of time.
-The final lift now has some pillars on the sides to prevent the assault zombies and infect humans easily. But humans can jump out and stand on the ramp behind the lift (I think is a good way to defend the lift, if people does not like i will change in a future version).
-Fixed exploit that alows players to open the room access door when the elevator has left the room.
-The elevator in the generator room now leaves faster and the half-closed door opens and closes faster.
-Optimized water room and the sun room with the last lift to improve perofrmance.
-Active buttons generate a blue glow to find the correct way more easy.
-Fixed doors killng players with their detail parts.
-When elevator and lift leaves, some arrows will spawn to indicate the way for zombies.
-Zombie health will be set to 7000 before the hold position at the first elevator and before the last hold before the star explodes.


--v1c--

-Tweaked lighting at the water rooms, greenhouses and last hold position, exta light in LDR.
-Modifyed time events to balance a little gameplay.
-Modifyed some hold positions for better defense.
-Optimized visibility for less mapsize and a little better performance.
-Added shake effects when star explodes.
-Improved cubemaps (less but with more quality).
-Improved lighting and shadows on some doors and props.
-Fixed some areas in corridors where players are not teleported.
-Players cannot get outside the station if they stand betweem the double doors of the escape pod,
they will die.

--v2--

-The client crash in the corridor between the double doors and the generator could be fixed in this version.
-Mapsize decreased from 110 to 67 MB, faster download.
-Added one more respawn room.
-Added one new path, both paths end togheter in the sun room.
-Modifyed all the outside station structure.
 *More FPS inside the greenhouses and in the escape room.
 *Improved the station outside desing.
 *Reflective greenhouses from outside.
 *Reflective escape pods.
-Zombies will recieve health more times to prevent dying early.
-Modifyed the star explosion effect, better quality, more FPS.
-Added a new song at the begin of the map.
-Modifyed the last 2 events, the hold in the pods and the blackhole.
 *The barricade at the right pod, the most used in earlier versions will break 7 seconds before pod doors closes.
 *If one zombie enters in one of both escape pods, all zombies inside the last room will be teleported to this pod when pods leave the platform.
 *The battle at the pods, when blackhole starts is faster.
 *Doors inside the pods does not rotate to make easier attack and to prevent blocking when closed.
-Some doors at the water rooms are open, or mid-open for better defense and less hold time.
-Improved some fx and detail objects around the map.

ZM_HOSPITAL_ESCAPE_B1A

Recommended Players: 24-32
Maximum Players: 32+

Based on zm_hospitalv4 by harregarre.
Remade by £cho for escape servers.

I whipped this up pretty quickly after getting permission from the original creator to try to make it an escape map. I've added blocked hallways so it's a sort of maze to get to the upper floor, then into the building with all the vending machines. Humans must then barricade themselves in, press the button, and wait for the escape door to open. Once it does, they run down a large hallway and underground into the bunker zone, where they must wait for an earthquake to pass.

Remember that this is a beta release. There are bound to be some bugs, but I playtested it and couldn't find anything wrong with it, to I figured I'd release it to the public for everyone to test.

Thanks and enjoy! =D
Comments, stamps, and assessments are welcome.

Regards,
£cho
Official FPSBanana ZombieMod Representative

_aLatestUpdates._sText: The year 2014 version. Don't expect too many new gameplay features. Other than some reworked bossfights (the secret boss having changed the most) and some reworked soundtrack, this update is mostly on a visual scale. Added more guidance to maps as well as increasing the level of scenery.

Overall, a minor update, but I fixed stuff and added other stuff. In terms of new features, there's not much except the "New Game Plus" feature. If you manage to reach the final boss rush of Holmes Escape and find the 3 secret switches before doing so, you unleash the curse of white face.

The next time you play holmes, assuming the server hasn't restarted first, you can fight a new boss, White Face. If you lose to him, he corrupts the map and locks off alternate routes. If you beat him, you unlock expert mode and a secret nuke weapon right from the getgo.

Basically, the entire map becomes harder but you have an overpowered weapon to compensate. It's new game plus.

_sText:
Holmes Escape is a jab at an open world zombie escape. Its not easy, its pretty difficult. It doesn't hold your hand either. To reach the final level, you must complete the 3 main levels. You can complete the levels in any order you want. The map adjusts itself according to how well you are doing, becoming easier if you keep dying, or becoming harder if you keep winning.

STAGES:
*PROLOGUE - The first level. You essentially have to defend the entrance at the start for 45 seconds before falling back while 1 person triggers the defense. This is probably the hardest defend point in this level due to how long you have to defend, the rest of this level is a cakewalk in comparison. Kill the zombie chopper and succeed the final defense.
*CAVE - This is most often the first level done. Use the golden shotgun wisely, there are 3 ways to manuever the cave, either by pushing the minecart, defending the guy, or going right and defending the boxes while someone climbs and hits the button. Kill the boss (Strider) and complete the stage.
*TOMB - This is most often the second level done unless a guy is competent with the hover boots. There are 2 ways to manuever the tomb but most people go the right path. The left path is harder and only done if you are trying to do the optional objective and make the boss a bit easier. Kill the boss (Fish) and complete the stage.
*STATION - This is most often the third level done unless a guy is competent with the hover boots. There are 2 ways to manuever the Station but most people go right or left at the intersection and go the Garage route. The mansion route is longer and harder and the garage people get to the end first. The Mansion route is only to do the optional objective.
*CITY - The final level. Combines the 3 normal stages, does a boss rush, a special zombie boss, and a final escape. Unlocks EXPERT MODE.
*SECRET - The secret level. Unlocked by doing either of the 2 objectives:
1.) Complete station/city/tomb on black world (hard mode)
2.) Unlock all 3 secret weapons and beat the final stage (City).

DIFFICULTIES:
*.) White World - Easy mode activates after losing a stage 3 times in a row.
*.) Black World - Activates by completing the first level or completing an optional objective in a stage. Deactivates when humans lose 1 single round
*.) Expert Mode - Complete the final stage (City) to unlock.

BOSSES:
*Zombie Chopper - Prologue Boss. Zombies ride the chopper to reach humans and can jump the sign/billboard (except in easy mode). Fall back after killing.
*Strider - The boss of the Cave. Relatively straight forward. Jump into snow after killing
*Fish - The boss of the Tomb. Kill it before you drown. Watch out for it trying to eat you, watch out for deadly bubbles, and watch out for poisonous water. Water can be made depoisoned by completing the Tomb stage's optional objective.
*Zombie Ringleader - The final boss is actually another player (!). Kill the zombie.
*Strider (Pissed Off!) - The rematch against the strider in the final level. Its attacks are more powerful.
*Fish (Pissed Off!) - The rematch against the Fish in the final level. Because humans are weakened by the strider fight and because there is no way to depoison the water this time, this fight is really a race against time. Kill it before you drown and de.
*Eye of the Devil - Secret Boss - Unlocks a new set of powerful attacks in expert mode, and casts magic faster in black world.

Credits/music used in the map (v1):

*Escape! (Lost Odyssey OST) - PROLOGUE Stage Theme
*Battle with the Demonic Beast (Lost Odyssey OST) - PROLOGUE Boss Theme
*Victory (Lost Odyssey OST) - STAGE CLEAR Theme
*Neverending Journey (Lost Odyssey) - Open World Theme - No levels completed
*Feel of the Night (Audition) - Open World Theme - 1 level completed
*The Other Side VIP Remix (Pendulum) - Open World Theme - 2 levels completed (note: Will probably be removed/replaced in a future version)
*Somnus (Yoko Shimomura) - Open World Theme - Black/White World theme song
*Vanquish OST - Freight Train Battle 1 - TRAIN STATION Stage Theme
*Two steps from Hell - To Glory - TOMB Stage Theme
*Vanquish OST - Argus Battle - TRAIN STATION Boss Theme / TOMB Boss Theme
*Immediate Music - Armed by Faith - CAVE Stage Theme
*Final Fantasy XIII-2 OST - Invisible Depths - CAVE Boss Theme
*Eternal Sonata OST - Scrap and Rebuild Ourselves - CITY Stage Theme
*Immediate Music - A thousand deaths - CITY Boss Theme / FINAL BOSS Theme
*Immediate Music - Archangel - SECRET Stage Theme
*Lost Odyssey OST - Howl of the Departed Souls - SECRET Boss Theme

Other credits:

*The rescue chopper in the Secret Level was lifted from ZE Train Escape. I claim no credit for that chopper. Everything else, brush wise, was all me.

Weapons in the map:

*Rocket Launcher - Clear the station level. It deals 1k damage if you shoot it just right and has 2 rockets, so that's 2k damage against a boss.
*Hover Boots - Clear the cave level
*Slow Gun - Clear the tomb level
**THE FINAL LEVEL (CITY) WILL BE AVAILABLE AFTER UNLOCKING THE THREE ABOVE WEAPONS.

**YOU DO NOT HAVE TO DO THE OBJECTIVE FOR YOUR VICTORY TO COUNT TOWARD THE SECRET BOSS REQUIREMENT, THOUGH

*Soda Shield - A secret weapon in the Train Station level
*Secret Documents - A secret weapon (?) in the Train Station level
*Tesla Suit - Found in the Cave as an optional objective. Damages nearby zombies, heals nearby humans, and deals 1k damage to the boss if you make it there alive.
*Headcrab - Weapon (?), more like an enemy. It's in the Cave level. It latches onto your face and kills you. It can easily be dodged, though, and will only kill 1 or 2 poor humans
*Active Camoflauge - In the tomb level. Entering this area makes you slightly invisible until the end of the level. It may carry over even if you are a zombie, so watch out. This is useful if you're trying to hide from the zombies in the final part of the Tomb level.
*Golden Shotgun - A secret weapon found in the HUB World in the Bar at the cave entrance. Push E to shoot/push zombies. Accessing this weapon becomes IMPOSSIBLE after beating the Cave level. You may desire to leave the cave level for last if you want to use this weapon in the other stages. Choices!

>Secret weapons: A secret weapon is unlocked by doing one of the 3 levels, on any difficulty EXCEPT white world. You have to complete the optional objective and then clear the stage in the same round. This means that if white world triggers for your level, or if you beat the level without doing the optional objective, you will essentially be "locked out" of that stage's secret weapon (unless you do some voodoo magic and manage to trigger black world before beating the level). The weapons are as follows:

>>Cyborg Suit - TOMB - Probably the easiest one to unlock, and since the Tomb is very likely the second level humans do this should be an easy one to get. The cyborg suit has 2 functions: Stealth camoflauge that makes you invisible and invincible to zombies for 5 seconds, and a slash wave that pushes zombies away. The functions have no recharge and can only be used once.
>>Soda Healer - CAVE - Probably the hardest and most difficult of the three secret weapons to unlock. It heals the surrounding team to 125 health and gives a small speedboost for 3 seconds. It has a recharge rate of 90 seconds.
>>Soda Shield - STATION - The medium tier one to unlock. Harder than the tomb, but easier than the cave. It's essentially just the Station's secret weapon unlocked in the hub, allowing you to use it outside of the station. It blocks zombies and acts as a push shield. Sustains 10 hits. 
>>Devil Ray of Destruction - Push E to kill all zombies directly in front of the caster. This is the hardest weapon to unlock.

v4 Changenotes:

FEATURES:
*A new secret weapon 'Devil Eye of Destruction' is now unlockable by defeating the secret boss. This is the ultimate secret weapon which instant kills any zombie near the caster. Once per round, no recharge.
*Completion of the prologue stage now triggers black world, meaning if humans dont lose a single round, you will be able to trigger the secret boss
*There is now a 2nd way to trigger the secret boss, which is simply by unlocking all 3 secret weapons. Make sure to do those optional objectives! This potentially means its possible to fight the secret boss twice in a single playthrough.
*The fish now shoots bubbles of death
*Added more to the final level, there is now a mini 'boss rush' of sorts before the final escape. Make no mistake, if you don't have Heal or the Tesla Suit, you will probably die. Only the chosen will survive.
*Simplified geometry and map optimization should be more kind to your FPS. Also fixed most of the annoying nodraw displacements and redid other displacements, although a couple nodraw displacements still exist.
*Changed the soundtrack around. No more salsa music.

FIXES:
*There is now an anti-stack system in place in the Tomb and Prologue. If a zombie breaches far enough in your bunker, you fail the mission and everyone in the bunker dies. There is some leeway so even if a zombie gets in your bunker as the doors close, you will be ok as long as you can keep it from getting close to you
*Fixed the fish god
*Fixed the final level
*Fixed the secret boss

This is also, conveniently, the hardest version to win probably.

Alternative download: http://rapidshare.com/files/4287258215/ze_holmes_escape_pf_v4a.bsp

# The Hobbit Escape 

<iframe width="560" height="315" src="//www.youtube.com/embed/Uk2ic9rgNe8" frameborder="0" allowfullscreen></iframe>

<iframe width="560" height="315" src="//www.youtube.com/embed/-A0tJo3pJzY" frameborder="0" allowfullscreen></iframe>
Follow Gandalf and the dwarves across the area of Goblins.
Find a path and escape through the eagles!

- Single-stage map
- Alternative way
- Playable characters and pickable items
- Music from Hobbit Movie OST
- Secret Easter Eggs ( Gollum and The Ring )

# Human Items 

**Legolas**
-------

Main ability: sprint for 10 seconds at 130% of normal speed
Secondary ability : Shoot flaming arrows. Ignites zombies for 3 seconds.

**Saruman**
-------

Main ability : Create an energy field that immobilizes and cause significant damage.
Secondary ability : Launches a energy ball that pushes the zombies back.

**The Shield**
----------

Create a barrier shield for 5 seconds.

**The Gandalf Staff**
-----------------

Create a protective field for 10 seconds

**The Deadly swords**
----------------- 

Summon an army of sword that can be run by the player. It instantly kills the zombie that is in contact (even the goblins and orcs)


**The Maul**
--------

Invokes mauls around the player who hold it. Ignite all the zombies approaching the holder

# Zombies items

The Goblins : Attack in melee , has 20% more speed and 10.000 HP.
**The Chaser :** Attack in melee, has 30% more speed and 7500 HP.
**The Orcs :** only available if humans are numerous. Character very slow but resistant

Main ability : Attack in melee
Secondary ability : sprint for 10 seconds,destroying all in its path (barrier and humans)

**The Witch King :** only available after winning the map.

# Easter Eggs items


**Sting (Bilbon blade)** 
--------------------

It turns blue when zombies are around.

**The Ring**
--------

Hard to find, this ring is protected by Gollum. If you manage to get it, it will make you invisible for 10 seconds.

you must find and destroy the vases 8 in order, to access this easter egg.

# Bugs

Send me bugs/glitch at this e-mail : captainjackcss@gmail.com Join a screenshot please.

- Single-stage map 
- Alternative way
- Playable characters and pickable items
- Music from Hobbit Movie OST
- Secret Easter Eggs ( Gollum and The Ring )

**Characters**

- LEGOLAS 
- SARUMAN
- GOBLIN  
- GOBLIN (second skin)
- ORC : speed and charge
- WITCH KING 

**Items**

- SHIELD
- MAUL
- SWORD
- BILBO BLADE
- GANDALF STAFF
- RING (invisibility)
- OTHERS : ladder, torch, cannon...

This is an alpha version but perfectly playable. 

The map WILL NOT be updated cause of problems IRL. If you want to fix bugs/optimize it, send me an email at : captainjackcss@gmail.com 

Thank You !

_aLatestUpdates._sText: New version of this map. In the anniversary version "ze_hl2_episodic_escape_v10" it is planned to add a boss, change locations, fix locations, optimize the map and fix bugs.

_sText: You have to escape from the city by train overcoming various paths. On the map are machine guns and other laser weapons. Also preserves the previous version of the same version of ze_citadel_episodic_escape_v04 https://gamebanana.com/maps/196476. Also, various content was taken from Half-Life 2 Beta 2003 and Half-Life 2 E3 2003 and Half-Life 2 Episode One and Half-Life 2 Episode Two (Citadel Destruction). As well as some of the content from third-party maps and prefabs.  The map is based on a plot from Half-Life 2 Episode One

Hi all.

This is Grand Boat Escape, its a massive update that took me a little while to do. It recreates tons of features within this map to improve game play and scenery. Overall, this map has been made to be MUCH harder, I felt that the older version out currently was way too easy and got boring very fast, but that should all change now with the amount of changes that has been added in version 3_6. Hope you guys/girls really like it. 

If your interested in seeing what the old version looked like, go here: [Grand Boat Escape](http://gamebanana.com/csszm/maps/155206 "Grand Boat Escape v1_9")

Added Feature List:

.More routs, this to hopefully give the player more power on witch way they go instead of just straight.

.Added boxes, they need to be jumped over by humans, but can be instantly be destroyed by zombies touching it. This is to slow the humans down and allow the zombies to catch up.

.Added douche bag doors, These doors can be permanently closed by a human. Thing is, they don't even block out zombies that well. I added them to block out other humans by slightly faster "trolly" individuals forcing the humans to take other routs.

.Greatly improved end fort, what has multiple layers and a Air Ship at the end that the humans must defend, and many more things.

.Changed the boat, hopefully will be better than the old one, It also allows the zombies to get in from the water, very hard though.

.Greatly improved the lighting and effects.

.3d Sky Box has now be finally added, this makes the map look much more larger.

.Added a thunder Storm.

.A lot of optimization has been done, to make way for all the improvements.

.In-proved sounds/music.

.and allot more! probably.

Ze Gibletz Establishment b6

Made by The Giblets of Jesus

___________________________________

What's the beef?

Humans Theres a bunch of terrorists and zombies about, you need to make it through that facility, make it off the island and blow the whole dam thing to Narnia! Zombies Theres some tasty looking humans about and they're looking to blow you and your beloved facility to hell! Stop them, eat them and return back the facility by lunch for a spot of zombie cricket :)
___________________________________

Genral map info

+HDR +64 Spawns
+Consistent high FPS
+No block highly advised
+6 Unique environments / settings
+2 New basic mini-games to keep AFK's amused until the cage is released :P
+7 Secrets
-3 Hats
-Music room (features 4 songs)
-The bonus score pallets ;O
-The credit areas / banners
-Secret cat panel (does fuck all :P)
-Gun room
___________________________________

Beta 6 changes

+Decreased the boat defense time from 30, to 15 seconds.
+Removed a few unnecessary things here and there, such as breakable metal panels at the beginning of the map, some concrete debris just after that and a bunch of other things (done to reduce map data and stop a compile error and large file size)
+Fixed the ending mines.
+Reduced the ending defense time from 30 seconds, to 10 and added some crates to make it easier to defend.
+Removed the 5th song from the music room (that would have been played at the end of the level) and made it a regular addition to the defense sequence.
+Reduced the angle the tram travels down at in an attempt to reduce the effects that no-block can have on it.
+Added some extra foliage and crates around the elevator.
+Decreased the strength of the spawn breakables.
+Added a fail-safe to stop people falling out of the boat and added crates and other props to make it easier to defend.
+Made a few things func_detail to improve FPS.
___________________________________

After stranding on the isolated island saving urself from the zombies in the dragonball world,a boat comes by the island. Happy with rescue u and ur team climb the boat in hope of rescue but swiftly hope runs down... As for the boat is a ghostship ,missing crew and power,u urself have to find a way of the boat and onto mainland!!
Unfortanetly one of ure team got infected and decided to keep it a secret,leaving u with two problems
Find a way of the boat,and survive the oncomming plague!!


Tips:
The best way to escape a boat is to get to the highest point possible!!
When stuck think of this-Thru the fire and the flames ,lies salvation

Note:includes The grendel song "zombie nation" and a working disco (as always all is controlled by a dj's setup!)

Note: Ze_Ghostship was made before Ze_Mad_DragonballZ ,it lacks alot in realism but i hope it makes up in gameplay,this was my first map to ever finish,to ever finish,not my first try:p but stil... it shows

Inspired by roy the ship and escapes like atix heli and island escape i give you ghostship,the newest in escape map.


Credits to eastsider and westsider and all the others who helped me when i had mapping problems


Note!!!: edit your server.cfg file!!!! the command "net_maxfilesize" has to be put larger then 25mb at least to make it possible for people to connect!!!
(this command negotiates the maximum amount of mb allowed to download from server)

ZE GAMESHOW V1_2
==================

Features
------------------

- A gameshow style Zombie Escape map!

- Three separate escape maps and a finale when all three are completed.

- A boss at the end of the finale with a health bar for reference.

- Music and particle effects for entertainment

- Weapon shop with access to those who complete at least 1 map
 
How it works
------------------

At the start of each round a human can select a map to play and once that map is beaten it is completed. To reach the finale all 3 maps must be completed!

To get a special weapon you must complete 1 of the ZE maps

The Special Weapons
------------------

Monkey Bombs - Activate the monkey bomb with 'E' and drop to hurt zombies! (4 bombs)

Push Gun - Press E to push away zombies! (30 sec recharge)

Freeze Gun - Press E to slow down zombies and hurt them over time (30 sec recharge)

Change log
------------------
v1_1: Fixed doors that could be walked through and area people with high jump could get to.

v1_2: Balanced Harbor and City for humans, added a secret DJ booth in the lobby, the monkey bomb is now 4 "mines", and the weapons now have better particle effects! After getting a special weapon you must win another round to get more in the future.

UPCOMING CHANGES FOR V2
==================

- More escapes! Boss Level will still require 3 of the escapes to be beaten, but if a server can complete all of the optional escapes an extreme ending will be activated

- With the extreme mode, I may introduce a contest similar to paper/mako/minas for the first servers or people to complete V2 with the extreme ending.

- A population modifier to balance the escapes for smaller servers.

- Redesign of the final escape to add more depth.

OFFICIAL RELEASE
==================

a very funny zombie escape map greeting to Jack themaster ^ ^
During an excavation project in the deep Antarctic, your team uncovers an ancient alien weapon, as well as a deadly virus that is is slowly turning your friends into zombies

An alien hive now dominates the city centre. With civilisation destoyed by these grotesque parasites only small pockets of survivors remain. Its hopeless....

Deep within the alien hive a new breed of hunter-killer hybrids are being incubated, and when they hatch there will be no way of defeating them...

This is a new version that is a zombie escape map instead of zombie mod. It is similar to atix. Ct's must activate the radio and call for helicopter evac before this sector is nuked. The radio is at the top of the tall castle like building.

"Kyrie"
"Someone Calls Me... Someone Looks For Me" from Parasite Eve. All composed by Yoko Shimomura
